title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local LLMs with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model support, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, Kotlin coroutines, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, completion, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting, and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or chatters in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, embeddings, fine-tuning, and edge deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama installations across macOS and Linux with CUDA/ROCm overlays.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector DB, and Nginx for a one-command RAG server.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing how to build a RAG chatbot backed by Ollama embeddings and Llama-3.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets server members chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using any Ollama model; supports templated prompts and front-matter.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama chat & embed endpoints so Claude Desktop can call local LLMs.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras 3 wrapper that treats Ollama models as a text generator layer for quick fine-tune experiments.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama with GenServer-backed connection pooling and LiveView chat examples.
